messages.subject: covet my ass
messages.messageBody:
<< Kathryn, who has been guilty of coveting her neighbor's ox >>

Kids LOVE that commandmant because you can say "ASS" right in church.
It was a pre-Beavis&Butthead moment.
"huh huh; he said 'ass'"



Sandra
